word: "Study to show thyself approved unto God, a workman that needeth not to be ashamed, rightly dividing the word of truth." "Thou therefore, my son, be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus." You will then have a commendable zeal. The laborer can accomplish much by personal conversation with those who oppose the truth, if he does not become rash and uncourteous. God calls upon all the advocates of the truth to present an uplifted Saviour. When your opponents would urge you into controversy, present to them the truth as it is in Jesus.
